channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole, 24th February
item.description:
Near busstop
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 346 Innsworth Lane, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes between lanes 2 and 3 northbound, 24th February
item.description:
The potholes are getting bigger and are between lanes 2 and 3 between markers M5 B79 and M5 B78.5. The pothole has been getting bigger over the last 2 months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Boddington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes on both elmfield road and elmfield avenue, 24th February
item.description:
These have been here for at least two years. The asphalt has come away from the surface of the road and is in serious need of repair

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Saint Mary's Mews, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose drain cover again!, 24th February
item.description:
The drain was 'fixed' less than 4 weeks ago by digging up the old drain and replacing the whole drain filling in badly with tarmac around the drain so no doubt that will need fixing soon. It started banging again about 2 weeks after it was replaced. If you could please return and fix/ add a seal to dampen /secure the cover before this time next year, I would be very grateful...
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 The Maples The Reddings, The Reddings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Another large pothole in Finchcroft Lane, 24th February
item.description:
Large pothole near Lamppost nos 3 Finchcroft Lane
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Finchcroft Lane, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes on Charlton abbots road, 23rd February
item.description:
Potholes at bend in road near entrance to farm at Charlton Abbots. 1 fixed this week but several other large deep holes remain. The surface of the road is cracked which may indicate more potholes will soon appear.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Assorted junk, 23rd February
item.description:
There is a pathway off Springbank Way down the side of no. 36a. Turning right at the end leads onto another pathway that goes along the back of the houses in Carlyle Grove. This pathway is a disgrace. Litter by the bag full & numerous items that have been fly tipped. Much of which is rotting & smells.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Hazlitt Croft, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive pothole and many smaller ones., 23rd February
item.description:
Well used road by Hospital workers, Fire Service & many elderly going to Fire Station for Covid Vaccine. One pothole is very large plus numerous smaller ones. Been a dreadful state for a while.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 College Baths Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of potholes!, 23rd February
item.description:
Extremely uneven road. Several large potholes. Urgently needs fixing, accident waiting to happen.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Pembroke House Down Hatherley Lane, Down Hatherley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hole, 23rd February
item.description:
Poor potholes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Ullenwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole again, 23rd February
item.description:
Potholes appearing too often on this part of road surely repairing ALL large or small holes would be better that sending a crew back every other week
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Tredington Park, Tredington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked Drain, 23rd February
item.description:
Drain on corner of entrance of Oakland Avenue is blocked. (On left hand side as you exit the junction, right on the corner). Huge puddle any time is rains.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 178a Prestbury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped in ditch, 23rd February
item.description:
Rubbish dumped in ditch between playground and skate park. This area is liable to flooding.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flood of 150meters along gretton rd, 23rd February
item.description:
I have reported it and a council department came and saw it and said it was not them but the highways and would report it 5 weeks ago. This was even more dangerous when it was frozen as cars going through this water was spreading it all over the paths and the road, I saw an elderley lady fall over. This is more like a stream (not a trickle) with a fast flow rate. This happened last year as well but did not resolve the problem.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 9 Gretton Road, Gotherington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previously report pothole become a pothole again, 22nd February
item.description:
Hi I previously reported this about 8 weeks ago - it was filled but its crumbled and cars and bikes are once again knocking into it - it is near the bollards on the Caernavan Road x hope you didnt pay to much the first time around to a contractor x Sorry to have to report it again x

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Broad Oak Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole, 22nd February
item.description:
Pothole extremely deep and sharp, on school side of road, just between colesbourne rd and st marks school. could easily cause damage to cars and injury to cyclists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 62 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bridge joints, 22nd February
item.description:
Bridge joints installed incorrectly, uneven joints. Water sat on top of tarmac indicates drainage not installed in joints.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Brockworth Bypass, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over grown hedgerow, 22nd February
item.description:
Can this even be called a footpath

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Streamside, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Alley choc full of black bin bags, 22nd February
item.description:
Alley way connecting New Street & the Lower High Street, between 9 New Street and rear of Oriental Stores completely blocked with black bags

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 New Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Advertising board attached to public notice board, 22nd February
item.description:
A paving/driveways company have attached a plastic advertising board to the public notice board at the corner of Robert Burns Ave and Bibury Rd using a cable tie.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Bibury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
